channel.title: 562 npc spawn command plz?
channel.description: i was looking through commands and realized i don't have a command that spawns npcs lol one would b appreciated

item.title: 562 npc spawn command plz?
item.dc:creator: @mod_mortl mod mortl
item.description:
@mod_mortl wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals("npc")) { if(player.getRights() <= 1) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("This command is for Admins only."); return; } if(cmd.length == 2) { int id = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); NPC npc = new NPC(id); npc.readResolve(); npc.setLocation(player.getLocation()); World.getInstance().getNpcList().add(npc); player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Internal id: " + npc.getIndex()); } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is ::npc ."); }

i think that is the one i got to so i should work

Read full topic

item.title: 562 npc spawn command plz?
item.dc:creator: @Sponge-Bob Sponge-Bob
item.description:
@Sponge-Bob wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals(“npc”)) {
if(player.getRights() <= 1) {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“This command is for Admins only.”);
return;
}
if(cmd.length == 2) {
int id = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]);
NPC npc = new NPC(id);
npc.readResolve();
npc.setLocation(player.getLocation());
World.getInstance().getNpcList().add(npc);
player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Internal id: " + npc.getIndex());
} else {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Syntax is ::npc .”);
}

Read full topic
